title: Everyone needs a hobby
author: VD
content_html: This meme brought to you courtesy of Aaron S. Coming soon: All the Rapes of Westeros: An Encyclopedia of Sexual Assault Fantasies by G. Rape Rape Marten. Complete with illustrations drawn in crayon by the author. And by “soon”, I mean sometime in the next seven or eight years.
content_text:
